messages.subject: Nihonto Trader is closed
messages.msgSnippet: All, I closed Nihonto Trader 2 weeks early. It had not had any visitors since I announced it s closure and all funds had dried up and as such it was covered in
messages.messageBody:
All, I closed Nihonto Trader 2 weeks early. It had not had any visitors
since I announced it's closure and all funds had dried up and as such it
was covered in advertising so I thought, nows the time to go.

Thanks for any and all participation.

Cheers

Rich

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] kanji help please
messages.msgSnippet: I figured out one side roughly translated as  later, one can have accomplishment.... I thinking it s some sort of  Sage s saying , yeah, may have the
messages.messageBody:
I figured out one side roughly translated as " later, one can have
accomplishment...."
I thinking it's some sort of " Sage's saying ", yeah, may have the
modern version in fortune cookies.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

milt

Milt,
Indeed, I think I am familiar with this sentiment. I believe the American
version is, "The check is in the mail."
Peter

messages.subject: kanji help please
messages.msgSnippet: accquired this soft metal tsuba recently............ need help to figure out the kanji  meaning. I figured out one side roughly translated as  later, one can
messages.messageBody:
accquired this soft metal tsuba recently............
need help to figure out the kanji meaning.
I figured out one side roughly translated as " later, one can have
accomplishment...."
I thinking it's some sort of " Sage's saying ", yeah, may have the
modern version in fortune cookies.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

milt
